solution_line_template: If 1/4 inch on the map represents 8 miles on real land, 1 inch represents {map_unit_fraction_denominator} * {miles_per_quarter_inch} = {miles_per_inch} miles.

Since 1 inch represents {miles_per_inch} miles, {whole_inches_apart} inches represent {whole_inches_apart} * {miles_per_inch} = <<{whole_inches_apart}*{miles_per_inch}={miles_for_whole_inches}>>{miles_for_whole_inches} miles.

1/ 4 inch represents {miles_per_quarter_inch} miles, 1/8 inch represents {miles_per_quarter_inch} / {half_divisor} = <<{miles_per_quarter_inch}/{half_divisor}={miles_per_eighth_inch}>>{miles_per_eighth_inch} miles because 1/8 is half of 1/4.

If 1/8 inch represents {miles_per_eighth_inch} miles, {fractional_inches_numerator}/8 of an inch represents {fractional_inches_numerator} * {miles_per_eighth_inch} = {miles_for_fractional_inches} miles.
This means 3 3/8 inches on the map translate to {miles_for_whole_inches} + {miles_for_fractional_inches} = {total_actual_distance} miles.
